features: 【SERVICE FOR 8】 Terlulu 40 piece gold silverware set for 8 includes 8 dinner forks, 8 dinner spoons, 8 dinner knives, 8 teaspoons, 8 salad/dessert forks in normal size, perfect for most families.

【MODERN&ELEGANCE STYLE】 Matte gold silverware set adds the perfect touch of class and refinement to any place setting. Its modern silhouette and design, the slim profiles and pointed stems add a sophisticated, minimalist touch to your dinner table. With sleek simple design, the elegant gold flatware is perfect for family daily use, parties, wedding, hotel, restaurant, formal dinner, etc.

【HEALTHY AND PREMIUM MATERIAL】 This gold silverware set is made of high quality food grade 18/0 stainless steel without any harmful substances, rust resistance and nickel free, healthy and durable for everyday use, easy clean and dishwasher safe. Satin-finished polished craft makes our gold flatware have smooth surface and a shiny glean.

【PROPER WEIGHT AND ELONGATED HANDLE】 Nice weight stainless steel silverware set, not flimsy, solid construction and durable, never bend in daily use. Thin and long handle and the appropriate weight are added to perfect balance and ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feeling tired.
❤️【LIFETIME SUPPORT】If you have any questions about our silverware set, please contact us and we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Terlulu 40 Piece Elegant Gold Silverware Set 40-Piece gold silverware set is our top pick because of its high-quality construction, elegant design, satin finish and elongted handles that make each piece a pleasure to hold. With sleek simple design, the elegant flatware is perfect for family daily use, parties, wedding, hotel, restaurant, formal dinner, etc.

Terlulu Matte Gold Silverware Set Features Made of outstanding thick gauge stainless steel Rustproof & sturdy to ensure a longtime service Medium weight offers comfort to use and hold Good satin finished always keep its gloss persistent and shiny Modern design matches well with any style tableware set Easy clean by hand and dishwasher safe to save labor

Satin Finish Surface&Smooth Edge Gold satin finish surface for a luxurious your table setting. A clean,smooth,shiny surface is appropriate for both everyday use and more formal occasions—such as dinner parties and holiday gatherings. Thin&Long Handle&Elegant Design Thin and long handle with rounded curves make them truly timeless, proper gauge thickness and weight to hold comfortably. Its modern silhouette and design, gold satin finish add a luxurious, minimalist touch to your dinner table. Sturdy&Durable Our gold cutlery set is made of high quality food grade 18/0 stainless steel without any harmful substances, rust resistance and nickel free, healthy and durable for everyday use. Each silverware has a medium weight and thickness makes our flatware not bend under pressure and we think most people will fell comfortable and balanced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So impressed with the quality, weight and feel
reviews.reviewText: I love how heavy these are. They are truly a brushed finish. They do show water stains so I make sure to wash and dry my set. I have not run them through my dishwasher, even though it says they are dishwasher safe. I prefer to keep them as new looking as possible. The knives are not an aggressive edge. I wish they were slightly more cutting. The spoon is a very generous size and while at a different angle than most spoon bowls, it does not change how you have to eat. Nice long handles. Slim and sturdy but if you suffer from hand pain, they might be too thin. Definitely not ergonomic, but aesthetic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set for the price!
reviews.reviewText: They are very pretty. They feel nice to hold and the spoon is perfect for soup! I’m handwashing these however- I don’t think the pretty good color will hold up in dishwasher. I’d purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love this silverware, it has weight to them and very cuteUPDATE:leaves a metallic after taste in your mouth. i may return these because of that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish gold cutlery
reviews.reviewText: Its well-crafted, and adds a touch of luxury to dining. My son playfully called it "boogie," highlighting its opulent vibe. If you appreciate glam, this set is a winner, even if it gets some teasing for being a bit fancy. Definitely buying another set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight, and super small fork
reviews.reviewText: Looking to add a little flair and replace my current flatware. This is very pretty and appealing price but don't expect a heavy sturdy flatware set. I'm afraid as pretty as it is my family may not like its thin and lighter weight for balance as compared to my current very standard Mikasa flatware (prob TJ Max purchase). The salad fork is more a dessert fork. 4-stars on durability only to give benefit of doubt, as I haven't used them yet. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful gift idea!
reviews.reviewText: Waited a few months before writing this review. My daughter uses this flatware daily! It's dishwasher safe. It has not lost its color nor luster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality is great especially for the price. It looks expensive. I’ve received many compliments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy — love them
reviews.reviewText: They don’t feel cheap. Quality & looks aesthetically pleasing. Would buy again in different color.

Purchased this item to enhance the decoration of our Christmas dinner table, and was not disappointed. The set received was carefully packed (although, the box showed polished nickel color, was a bit confusing). Saw some reviews saying some rough or sharp edges could be found on some pieces. It was not my case. Took my time to unpack each piece and inspected thoroughly. Having preference for a slightly heavier utensils, I was pleased with that absence of that weight in that particular set which contributes to the elegance of it. The color/coating was consistent through out all pieces, and, I hope, will stay this way as I opted in to handwashing instead of putting them in the dishwasher. Not only this product has a good quality/look balance, but, also, price/quantity of pieces included.
This goes with my black and gold dinnerware, my black Japanese dishes, everything special.I have given away all my stainless steel to use these.They are truly elegant.
